text: José Vieira Filho, known as Vieira (born 1 July 1992) is a Brazilian football player who plays for Novo Hamburgo. ==Career== ===Club career== He made his professional debut in the Segunda Liga for Penafiel on 8 August 2015 in a game against Leixões. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:People from Morro Agudo Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Associação Atlética Internacional (Bebedouro) players Category:União Agrícola Barbarense Futebol Clube players Category:F.C. title: José Vieira Filho
